column5: Hey everyone,  I'm looking to get some great footage for a new project I'm working on that is dedicated strictly to the use of GoPro's while fishing.  Please PM me the links to your favourite pictures/videos and I'll choose the best footage to display on the website.  Please ONLY submit pictures/videos that have been taken using GoPro's.   Cheers,  Stoty
So let me get this straight. You won't post reports here but you want everyone to send you their reports privately?
